channel.title: Tempo variation
channel.description: Is it possible that we will have a tempo slider in the future. To change tempo during song? Also pitched tempo?

item.title: Tempo variation
item.dc:creator: El1011
item.description:
people have been requesting that for a while, but the devs don’t seem to have it on their radar for Auxy updates, largely because they feel it won’t actually see a whole lot of use (which compared to 99% of tracks out there, is reasonable).

Read full topic
